thread.title: Check out the new trailer for the 'X-Files' revival — VIDEO
thread.title_full: Check out the new trailer for the 'X-Files' revival — VIDEO | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Christopher Lawrence
title: Check out the new trailer for the 'X-Files' revival — VIDEO
text:
The truth is still out there. 
In case you didn’t catch it during Monday’s episodes of “Gotham” and “Minority Report,” Fox has just released the first extended trailer for the return of “The X-Files.” 
Debuting Jan. 24 and 25 , the six-episode event series overseen by creator Chris Carter reunites FBI agents Fox Mulder (David Duchovny) and Dana Scully (Gillian Anderson). Their long-suffering boss, Walter Skinner (Mitch Pileggi), and “Cigarette Smoking Man” (William B. Davis) return as well. 
Debuting in September 1993, “The X-Files” spanned nine seasons and two movies: 1998’s “The X-Files: Fight the Future” and 2008’s “The X-Files: I Want to Believe.” 
It also taught a whole new generation that believing in little green men was cool.. 
Contact Christopher Lawrence at clawrence@reviewjournal.com . Find him on Twitter: @ Life_OnTheCouch
